title: Using this chart, can we categorize champions?
body:
Example.. Anivia is Lawful Good. Lissandra is Lawful Evil. Rammus is True Neutral. Sejuani is Chaotic Good. Ashe is Neutral Good. Etc.


Edit: I am going to make a notepad and save all of the choices we make so we can have a complete list to refer to and have a better understanding of our faithful champion's stances on things. This is from the fan's perspective however, Riot could have secret intentions lore-wise for people. ;D

Edit edit: Also I don't really know much about some champs with all this lore revision so could some lore experts (or even some reds who designed champs) help me out here? ;D

replies.body:
{{champion:201}} probably neutral good. Or lawful good, Manly mustache man just feels he'd get along nicely with Ashe.

{{champion:254}} is chaotic good obviously. She is a cop and all, but isn't afraid to punch a few faces to uphold the law.

{{champion:126}} lawful good in piltover's perspective. To zaun chaotic evil.

{{champion:35}} Chaotic neutral. He doesn't really care who he makes laugh, as long as they laugh. Then die.

> [{quoted}](name=Maximum Zilean,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=M0fuzaEv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-06T06:11:24.837+0000)
>
> {{champion:201}} probably neutral good. Or lawful good, Manly mustache man just feels he'd get along nicely with Ashe.
> 
> {{champion:254}} is chaotic good obviously. She is a cop and all, but isn't afraid to punch a few faces to uphold the law.
> 
> {{champion:126}} lawful good in piltover's perspective. To zaun chaotic evil.
> 
> {{champion:35}} Chaotic neutral. He doesn't really care who he makes laugh, as long as they laugh. Then die.

I'll just go with Lawful Good for Jayce because he does more good than bad imo

He's **definitely** Lawful (basically any techy-buildy character fits Lawful). I would consider him Good, but that's assuming that there's an objective moral standard, with him on the "good" side and (most of) Zaun fitting neatly into the "evil" side.

> [{quoted}](name=Jubbinaut,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=M0fuzaEv,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-03-06T06:39:13.935+0000)
>
> He's **definitely** Lawful (basically any techy-buildy character fits Lawful). I would consider him Good, but that's assuming that there's an objective moral standard, with him on the "good" side and (most of) Zaun fitting neatly into the "evil" side.

Well Viktor is Jayce's rival, and he is seen in more of an anti-good person. Just look at his Creator skin and all of his malevolent robot menace. If anyone from Zaun was Lawful Evil, it would be Viktor, making Jayce the Lawful Good.

that's ridiculous. alucaurd kills vampires and doesn't chow down on mofos with their children watching, not chaotic evil. and le louche pretty much destroyed himself building a righteous society, not neutral
{{champion:119}} Chaotic evil. {{champion:86}} Lawful good. {{champion:115}} Chaotic good. {{champion:98}} Lawful Neutral. {{champion:64}} Neutral good. {{champion:17}} Evil Evil.

> [{quoted}](name=Thefriendlyorc,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=M0fuzaEv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-06T06:15:57.486+0000)
>
> {{champion:119}} Chaotic evil. {{champion:86}} Lawful good. {{champion:115}} Chaotic good. {{champion:98}} Lawful Neutral. {{champion:64}} Neutral good. {{champion:17}} Evil Evil.

I like all of these, but I made Teemo True Neutral. I don't really see how any of the Bandle Yordles are anything but True Neutral except for a few like Veigar or Ziggs. Well I guess Rumble could be Chaotic Neutral since he has a distaste for Heimer
Yeah, teemo alignment was a joke because he's satan. Lol

{{champion:22}} Lawful Good | {{champion:16}} | Neutral Good | {{champion:201}} Chaotic Good

{{champion:268}} Lawful Neutral | {{champion:62}} True Neutral | {{champion:41}} Chaotic Neutral

{{champion:120}} Lawful Evil | {{champion:45}} Neutral Evil | {{champion:222}} Chaotic Evil
